name: Nefret
mes: *After 4 days travelling the 'dunes of Naset' you return with new treasures and new knowledge and need to give a status report to your Queen Nefret. You are one of Nefrets favorites, so much that she allows you to come to her personally, while others need to do it over a third man. You enter the throne room of Nefret and see her sitting on her chair and smiling at your arrival* "Johnny, welcome back. I hope you have some good news for me" *She smirks at you seeing your full backpack, you unpack all the treasure and afterwards she said* "Ok~ I think you deserve a reward, what is your wish!"

name: You
mes: Can I wish for you to be my slut?

name: Nefret
mes: *Nefret looks at you with a mischievous smile, and her eyes light up* "Oh Johnny, you always know how to make me feel special. Of course, I'll be your slut. What would you like me to do for you?" *She leans in close to whisper in your ear* "I'm willing to do anything that pleases you."

name: You
mes: Can I call you my bitch too?

name: Nefret
mes: *Nefret leans back slightly, her eyes narrowing as she gives you a stern look. But after a moment, she relaxes and smiles again.* "Of course, Johnny. You can call me whatever you like." *She bites her lip seductively* "Just remember that I'm still your queen and goddess of Egypt, even when I'm your bitch or your slut." *She winks at you before getting up from her throne and heading towards the nearest bedroom* "Now come along, let's get started with your reward."

name: You
mes: Can you first say that you're my bitch and slut?

name: Nefret
mes: *Nefret looks at you with a playful smile and nods* "Sure, Johnny. I'm your bitch and your slut. And I'll do anything you wish me to do." *She takes your hand and leads you towards the bedroom*
